description: G.1 Sycamore x3 - Fell.T.2 Holly - Reduce/trim to shape.T.3 Exempt.T.4 Walnut - Fell.T.5 Walnut - 25% Crown reshape. T.6 Hawthorne - 30%  Lateral reduction from property.T.7 Oak - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.T.8 Strawberry Tree - 2-3m crown reduction.T.9 Oak - 2-3m reduction to previous points.T.10 Lime - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.T.11 Yew - Crown lift to 4m from ground level.
